channel.title: dreaming on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in dreaming on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Dreaming Through ´Ka´
item.description: The author seems to be trying to achieve the effect of time all being one moment. The effect of this hits the reader in full force in the end when it goes back to Garuda, who was last mentioned in the first chapter reading the Rg Veda, waking up from a light doze on the word ‘Ka’.

item.title: Android body vs Human body
item.description: A lot of futuristic science fiction puts forward several ideas of what an android would be like. Data from Star Trek (TNG) is an intriguing character who tries very hard to understand what it is to be human.
